svm=SVC()
svm.fit(x_train,y_train)
ypr=svm.predict(x_test)
from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix,accuracy_score
print(accuracy_score(y_test,ypr))
print(confusion_matrix(y_test,ypr))
